overview: Newcummer Jamal al Din, a young and beautiful Arabian teenage twink, rests in the solitude of a Saharan dune with an old trunk left behind by some long-ago lost Sir Galahad. Inside the chest, Jamal discovers a tantalizing tome -- a sex-filled storybook -- that takes the viewer on a jizz-filled journey from one erotic scene to another.
title: Arabian Tales
